name: 99 Bubbles Blitz HD
description:
*** App Store What's Hot! and New and Noteworthy! ***
99 Bubbles Blitz, a fast, furious, and addictive 99 seconds worth of bubble popping fun. Bubbles float, bump, bounce, and pop continuously, just like in real life. Pop while they float or wait for them to pack for higher scores. Multipliers, and larger clusters up your scoring abilities. Power bubbles allow you to pop a single bubble, explode a bomb or activate the gravity well, as long as you have enough coins, your powers are limitless. Each bubble is rendered in ultra high resolution 3D highlighting the relaxing beach scene backdrop. How fun is that! Need more challenge, invite a friend to play a Shootout, and may the best popper win.

Instructions:
Tap a bubble to match at least three of the same color, but get as many as you can together for bigger scores. You've only got 99 Bubbles at a time, and only 99 seconds to get your maximum score, so use them wisely, strategy and speed are key to maximum scores.

It's time to start popping ... 99 Bubbles Blitz!

Highlights:
Realistic bubble active physics.
Shootout w/Friends.
Bonus coins for power bubbles.
Ultra HD bubble graphics.
Sequential matching.
Completely freeform packing.
New colors every game.
Dramatic lighting effects.
High score tracker.
Game Statistics.
